title: 30 Things You Can Say to Both Your Toddler and Your Drunk Friend
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Comedy - Today 
Toddlers can be irritable, opinionated, self-righteous creatures. Parenting them often reminds me of taking care of a drunk friend. A drunk ...
